summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingThis benefit-packed DAISE Hydrating Lip Balm is formulated with skin-loving ingredients such as Vitamin E, Shea Butter and Coconut and Avocado Oils to ensure 8-hour moisture and smooth, hydrated lips for longer.
details: DetailsBenefitsLong-lasting hydrationNourishes and softensCan be worn overnight as a moisture maskFeaturesLip balm for 8-hour moistureSubtle watermelon flavor, non-tintedMade with 90% natural ingredients, Vitamin E and Shea ButterDermatologically testedFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesSulfatesBHA/BHTSiliconesHeavy MetalsAnimal TestingItem 2636692How To UseTwist flower shape open to reveal balm. Apply as needed, either alone or as a lip primer.Warning: For External Use Only. Do Not Consume. If Irritation Occurs Or Continues Consult Your Physician. Keep Out Of Reach Of Children.IngredientsHelianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Beeswax, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Synthetic Wax, Microcrystalline Wax, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Tocopherol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Parfum (Fragrance), Benzyl Benzoate.
how_to_use: Twist flower shape open to reveal balm. Apply as needed, either alone or as a lip primer.Warning: For External Use Only. Do Not Consume. If Irritation Occurs Or Continues Consult Your Physician. Keep Out Of Reach Of Children.

reviews.headline: Love this item
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] such unique and cute packaging. love how this moisturizes my lips and let's not forget the scent. it's to die for. will continue to repurchase once i run out!

reviews.headline: Had higher expectations but I'll use it
reviews.comments: I have been trying this lip balm for 2 weeks now and my lips are dry and begging for moisture. It feels like this is hydrating in the beginning and its soft, but after an hour I look like Spongebob begging for a glass of water. Do NOT recommend.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I bought this and when it arrived it was one day earlier and they put it in protective packaging so it would not be damaged and not damage was on the package at all

reviews.headline: Don't buy
reviews.comments: This is awful. Yes it was super cheep but i could buy an eos or vasilline lip balm for around the same price and actually enjoy it. The coconut scent smeels nothing like coconut its just a weird smell. It takes forever to get product on your lip. Literally sit there swiping it on my lip over and over and nothing. Spend the extra dollar or 2 and skip this product.

reviews.headline: I am in love with this product!
reviews.comments: This product makes my lips feel so soft and smooth

reviews.headline: I would buy the whole stock
reviews.comments: I bought the vanilla lip balm and the coconut lip balm for a friend. The lip balms are at such a good price and have the cutest packaging.They are perfect gifts.They are so moisturizing.This is my go to lip balm now!

reviews.headline: 10/10 would buy again
reviews.comments: packaging is SUPER cute and scent is amazing. product is very hydrating and smooth on the lips. ingredients seem to be very clean and easy to research!

reviews.headline: Soooo good!!
reviews.comments: Love this lip balm! I used to love those little EOS egg lio balms as a kid and these are exactly like that. I got the coconut flavored one and tastes soooo good. Plus it really hydrates and leaves the lips moisturized for hours. Would absolutely recommend!

reviews.headline: Um
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Smells great but actual lip balm is not something special. A simple lip balm in a very hard to hold tube. Don't get me wrong it moisturized my lips but it didn't do it very well.

reviews.headline: Recommend
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I LOVE THE PRODUCT! Leaves my lips so moisturized and is perfect for on the go! The packaging is also so cute and the scent is phenomenal! I highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Don't waste your money
reviews.comments: It smells and tastes great. But thats it. My lips dried out even after continual days of using this product. Go with soemthing different

reviews.headline: obsessed
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] It smells so good and makes my lips feel so soft. I love the container too it's so cute. Coconut scent is perfect for summer and it's not too thick feeling.

reviews.headline: My favorite lip balm ever!!
reviews.comments: So i saw this brand on youtube and decided i wanted to try it because the package is so cute and all the Daise products are VERY affordable! I got one of each of the products and they did NOT disappoint! Daise ate and left NO crumbs with this one, (and the rest of their products!) LOVE LOVE LOVE Will be buying more for me and for gifts!~~~~~~

reviews.headline: This Product Makes Me Happy
reviews.comments: I love this product so much! It keeps your lips not chapped for around eight hours. As I said on the top it makes me happy. The reason it makes me happy is because it was super inexpensive.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this with my money
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Immediately when I got this product I couldn't help but say it was cheap. Everything about it feels and smells cheap. The plastic is thin, the lil balm smells like fake vanilla and doesn't do its job and over all I would never purchase this product myself! Its cute but thats it.

reviews.headline: Ok lip balm really cute
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Honestly smells good and feels really nice on the lips. Does not dry and is not intense either. The packaging is super cute and a unique shape that will be unique to the brand I'm sure! The product itself is spherical so not super high maintenance or anything and enough product to last a while.

reviews.headline: So cute ðŸŒ¸
reviews.comments: Packaging was so cute! It came in a flower shaped package and the container was a flower shape which i absolutely love! The lip balm itself applies super smooth and it smells amazing!!

reviews.headline: Hydrating lip balm
reviews.comments: pretty lip balm that keeps lips very moisturized and hydrated as it has many oils in it. It has a really nice scent as well which is vanilla and the packaging is very cute too.

reviews.headline: Good buy
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Gave to my mom and she liked the product. Good packaging, great feel, and scent. Overall good quality and my mom said she did not feel the product was cheap.

reviews.headline: Great and hydrating!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Adorable and very smooth! Love the feeling of application and definitely hydrated my lips. The vanilla smell wasn't overbearing and the ingredients felt very high in quality!

media.headline: Received for influnster for a review
It's an okay lip balm, but it has super cute packaging.

faceoff_positive.comments:
The Hydrating Lip Balm in Watermelon has a fun, fruity scent that's very reminiscent of bubblegum watermelonâ€”sweet and playful, though it leans a bit artificial. It's a nice burst of fragrance, but there's a noticeable undertone of wax that can take away from the overall experience.

The packaging is shiny plastic and feels a bit on the cheap sideâ€”light and flimsy, which makes it feel less premium than some other lip balms. The balm itself is shaped like an egg, similar to EOS, which is cute but not the most practical if you're looking for precision.

In terms of texture, it's definitely on the oilier side, leaving a slick layer on the lips. It feels smooth and hydrating initially, but it doesn't seem to do much for rehydrating dry lips. Instead, it just creates a barrier to prevent further drynessâ€”like an oil layer that sits on top rather than sinking in.

As for longevity, the balm doesn't last too long. It tends to wear off quickly because of the slick, greasy feeling, so you'll likely need to reapply every couple of hours.

Overall, this lip balm is nice for a quick moisture fix and a fun scent, but it doesn't provide lasting hydration or a substantial treatment for dry lips. It's more of a lightweight, temporary solution.
faceoff_positive.headline: Fun Lip Balm

faceoff_negative.comments: The initial packaging was a little frustrating to open because there was not a clear way to get the cardboard and plastic off without cutting it open and the scent of the balm was very strong. The second I cut through the packaging I could already smell the coconut and that was before I even had the packaging completely off or the cap twisted off. The scent had a slight sunscreeny smell to it which I was a bit put off by and the taste of it was horrendous. I wasn't trying to taste it, but a product that you put on your lips is bound to get on your tongue at some point and even a tiny bit of the product in my mouth was awful. It had a bitter, chemical taste and left my tongue feeling very weird. The balm itself was also very thick and waxy which some people may prefer, but I prefer a smoother balm, and the shape of the balm (almost an egg shape) was also a little awkward to use to put on my lips. I am not going to use the rest of this product because of the awful chemical taste and I don't feel safe using it if it tastes that bad and is on my lips where it's bound to get in my mouth. I really did not like this product at all.
faceoff_negative.headline: Taste and texture awful
